metadata.title: CVE-2022-48646 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sfc/siena: fix null pointer dereference in efx_hard_start_xmit Like inprevious patch for sfc, prevent potential (but unlikely) NULL pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
